pageProps.description: A summed-area table operation is quickly and efficiently generate  the sum of values in a rectangular subset of a grid.  [More on wiki](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Summed-area_table).   [Interactive Summed-Area Table Generation... (AMD)](http://developer.amd.com/wordpress/media/2012/10/GDC2005_SATEnvironmentReflections.pdf)
